title: Foreigners buy $1.8 million worth Sri Lanka rupee bonds last week
byline: Sri Lanka has seen nearly $70 million foreign inflows into rupee bonds through May 22 this year

title: Sri Lanka rupee opens stronger, bond yields down sharply
byline: While stock market rallied, bond yields dropped sharply

title: BYD China slashes Seagull to 2.3mn Sri Lanka rupees, Song 4.5mn

title: Sri Lanka to develop Marine Drive as night tourism hotspot
byline: 'Marine Nights: Awakening Colombo' project to facilitate night tourism

title: Sri Lanka to proceed with Hyatt building sale, Deloitte retained to advice
byline: "The most suitable option to raise the necessary funds has been identified as through selling shares of the company."
